s.text: However, obese people given injections of the hormone leptin in a study lost weight proportionate to dosage and lost fat cells only (25 percent of weight loss from diet and exercise is bone and muscle).

Yesterday's special issue of the Journal of the American Medical Association , on obesity, lands on the fronts of the Post , NYT , and LAT . Every paper spins it differently.

Besides Intel and Microsoft, Dow is adding Home Depot and SBC Communications; it is booting Chevron, Sears, Union Carbide, and Goodyear.
